TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpValidationStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides enumerated values that indicate cache validation status.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpValidationStatus IgnoreThisRequest = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the request is treated as a cache miss and the page is executed. The cache is not invalidated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpValidationStatus Invalid = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the cache is invalid. The item is evicted from the cache and the request is handled as a cache miss.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.HttpValidationStatus Valid = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the cache is valid.
